subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Even as Arsenal awakens from its funk, voices are calling for its coach Arsène Wenger to give way for Jürgen Klopp, whose Dortmund team is also struggling.
snippet: Even as Arsenal awakens from its funk, voices are calling for its coach Arsène Wenger to give way for Jürgen Klopp, whose Dortmund team is also struggling.
